title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – CLI and Go library to pull, run and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async wrapper for the Ollama HTTP API; installable via PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models; runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Python CLI that wraps ollama-python for interactive chats, model management and prompt templating.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library (Maven Central: ollama4j) with synchronous, reactive and Kotlin-Coroutines APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem (ollama-rb) providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open WebUI, Postgres and Nginx for quick local labs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) exposing Ollama models as generators and chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes showing how to fine-tune, quantize, deploy and integrate Ollama models in various stacks.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub under ollama/ollama.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Community bridge that lets you pull and convert Hugging Face models into Ollama GGUF format with one command.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for Q&A, summarization and brainstorming inside your vault.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot (Node) that answers channel questions using any Ollama model via Bolt framework.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n community node that embeds Ollama chat and completion actions into automation workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing strongly typed sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Fork of GPT4All UI that adds an Ollama adapter so you can serve the same interface backed by Ollama models.
